RemoteConfiguration.Name: All computers in one location
RemoteConfiguration.Description: All computers in one location (Quest AD cmdlets)
RemoteConfiguration.ScriptComputerName: $location = Read-Host -Prompt ‘Enter the AD site location where you would like to run your script in the space provided.’ Add-PSSnapin -Name Quest.ActiveRoles.ADManagement -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Get-QADComputer -Location $location -SizeLimit 0 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name

RemoteConfiguration.Name: Computers listed in a text file
RemoteConfiguration.Description: A list of computers stored in a text file

RemoteConfiguration.Name: Domain controllers
RemoteConfiguration.Description: All domain controllers in my current domain (Quest AD cmdlets)
RemoteConfiguration.ScriptComputerName: Add-PSSnapin -Name Quest.ActiveRoles.ADManagement -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Get-QADComputer -ComputerRole DomainController -SizeLimit 0 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name

RemoteConfiguration.Name: Exchange servers
RemoteConfiguration.Description: All Exchange servers discovered in my environment (Quest AD cmdlets)
RemoteConfiguration.ScriptComputerName: Add-PSSnapin -Name Quest.ActiveRoles.ADManagement -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue $rootDSE = Get-QADRootDSE Get-QADObject -Type msExchExchangeServer -SearchRoot $rootDSE.ConfigurationNamingContext -SizeLimit 0 | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Name
